thread.title: 30,000 jobs at risk as business fails at Toys 'R' Us

title: 30,000 jobs at risk as business fails at Toys 'R' Us
text:
30,000 jobs at risk as business fails at Toys 'R' Us 6:51pm IST - 01:40 
Toys 'R' Us Inc, the iconic toy retailer, will shutter or sell its stores in the United States after failing to find a buyer or reach a deal to restructure billions in debt, putting at risk about 30,000 jobs. Ciara Lee reports
